function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improperly adjusted head-mounted virtual reality devices causing blurry images and text","Impact":"Healthcare educators needing more time to plan lessons and teach learners to use VR devices","Mitigation":"Provide proper training and instructions for adjusting and using VR devices","Technologies":"Virtual reality device calibration software","People":"Healthcare educators, learners","Owner":"Educational institutions, VR device manufacturers"},{"Description":"Securing electronic medical records using Blockchain","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive medical records","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust access control and encryption protocols","Technologies":"Blockchain-based access control and encryption systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology providers"},{"Description":"Intrinsic experience in a safe virtual environment using blockchain","Impact":"Potential unauthorized movement out of quarantine facility","Mitigation":"Integration of blockchain-based identification and access control system","Technologies":"Blockchain-based identification and access control system","People":"Quarantine facility staff, individuals in quarantine","Owner":"Health authorities, quarantine facility administrators"}]}
